data.title: poet at allpoetry
data.meta_description:
Poems by The Nightengale.  A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases; it will never pass into nothingness.                                                      
- John Keats.
data.text:
Trapped and feeling small

Still beating fists

Trying to break down that wall

Brick by brick inside my brain

Can't talk

Can't stop

Stuck in blind confusion

Crying for help inside

Silently terrified of what I do not understand.

I’m on the Autism Spectrum which makes it hard to understand people sometimes and sometimes makes me feel rather confused, isolated, and alone... so I wrote about it. Not saying there aren’t good aspects of having An Autism Spectrum Disorder, I’m just writing right now about how it can make life rather hard. © on Dec 25 2020 11:23 PM PST, Gabriella Volk misc • pain • sad • society

Please give me all the languages,

so that I may find my voice,

for it is hard for me to understand,

how sometimes I feel broken and without a choice,

scattered by demands,

so stuck inside my head,

lost without words,

without a voice,

choking on failed plans,

flailing with the thoughts inside,

as my mouth moves wordless.

And maybe it’s normal, must happen to everyone,

getting lost inside their heads, not able to speak, but I feel brain dead.

Please gift me all the languages,

so that I may understand.

© on Dec 20 2020 09:42 PM PST, Gabriella Volk
